name: ArtifactoryPromote
description: This task helps you to promote a build into JFrog Artifactory
author: jfrog

inputs.name: targetRepo
inputs.label: Target repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: Repository to move or copy the build's artifacts and/or dependencies

inputs.name: comment
inputs.label: Comment
inputs.helpMarkDown: An optional comment describing the reason for the promotion.

inputs.name: sourceRepo
inputs.label: Source repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source repository to promote the release published artifacts from. If non selected, Artifactory would decide from which repository to promote from.

inputs.name: includeDependencies
inputs.label: Copy/move build's dependencies
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true, the build dependencies are also promoted.

inputs.name: copy
inputs.label: Copy artifacts
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to copy instead of move, when a target repository is specified.

inputs.name: dryRun
inputs.label: Dry run
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, promotion is only simulated. The build is not promoted.
